summary: Two families are brought together by the return of one family's son -- a reunion that conjures up old ghosts and issues that must be addressed.
cast: Elizabeth Ashley|Jayce Bartok|Bruce Dern|Miriam Shor|Aaron Stanford|Kristen Stewart|Talia Balsam|Tom Cavanagh|Melissa Leo|Jesse L. Martin|Avery Rak|Andrew George Jr.|Dan McCabe|Conor Romero|Jeffrey Spiegel|Elizabeth Van Meter|Lucas Papaelias|Elle Key|Robert Meo|E.J. Carroll|Stephen Payne|Elizabeth Girardeau|Devin Ratray|Grant Monohon|Dylan Denton|Susan Gardner|Marylouise Burke|Phillip X Levine|Kara Duffus|Dave Dyshuk|Mary E. Freeman|Zoe Hunter|George Radel|Nicole Signore
title: The Cake Eaters
